problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following describes Make To Stock production？<<
(x) Items are available for purchase when a customer arrives ( ) Items are ordered when customers arrive ( ) Items are assembled to order when customers arrive ( ) Items are designed when a customer arrive.
[Explanation] Make to stock literally means making the product so it is in stock at the point of sale. [Explanation]
